opennlp.tools.util.eval

Interface EvaluationMonitor<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChunkerEvaluationMonitor, DoccatEvaluationMonitor, LanguageDetectorEvaluationMonitor, LemmatizerEvaluationMonitor, ParserEvaluationMonitor, POSTaggerEvaluationMonitor, SentenceDetectorEvaluationMonitor, TokenizerEvaluationMonitor, TokenNameFinderEvaluationMonitor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChunkerDetailedFMeasureListener, ChunkEvaluationErrorListener, opennlp.tools.cmdline.DetailedFMeasureListener, DetokenEvaluationErrorListener, DoccatEvaluationErrorListener, DoccatFineGrainedReportListener, opennlp.tools.cmdline.EvaluationErrorPrinter, LanguageDetectorEvaluationErrorListener, LanguageDetectorFineGrainedReportListener, LemmaEvaluationErrorListener, LemmatizerFineGrainedReportListener, NameEvaluationErrorListener, POSEvaluationErrorListener, POSTaggerFineGrainedReportListener, SentenceEvaluationErrorListener, TokenEvaluationErrorListener, TokenNameFinderDetailedFMeasureListener, TokenNameFinderFineGrainedReportListener
